channel.title: Could not find or load main class - solved thank you!
channel.description: I'm using ardi client v2, can someone help me with this error :palm: I don't understand why im getting this issue everything is correct!

item.title: Could not find or load main class - solved thank you!
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:4, topic:551432”][quote author=Mr.Draconian link=topic=670348.msg4482530#msg4482530 date=1431205174]
Seriously?

What does the java files got to do with running the server, the server is runned with class files and the java files are used to easily configure/edit the class files.

So what he said, your missing the client.class
[/quote]
Calm your tits. Simple mistake, relax.[/quote]

Lol its okay i got it, its just because there were a few errors that needed fixed , thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Could not find or load main class - solved thank you!

What does the java files got to do with running the server, the server is runned with class files and the java files are used to easily configure/edit the class files.

item.source: Could not find or load main class - solved thank you!

item.title: Could not find or load main class - solved thank you!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Draconian Mr.Draconian
item.description:
@Mr.Draconian wrote:

Welliton_inc:

It cannot find your main .class client file. You are either missing your client.java and client.class or you need to compile.

Seriously?

What does the java files got to do with running the server, the server is runned with class files and the java files are used to easily configure/edit the class files.

So what he said, your missing the client.class

Read full topic
item.source: Could not find or load main class - solved thank you!
